contentList.content: Arcanists are wizards born with an innate ability to manipulate magic, using their unique insight into the workings of magic to apply both approaches at once.
Ritual casting allows the caster to invoke certain spells without expanding a spell slot. Currently only Find Familiar is supported.
Psychic Arcanists favor spells that target psyche, gaining knowledge of spells that normally are not available to Wizards or Sorcerers.

Using Sorcery Points Exploiters can invoke the effects of certain spells intuitively by bending the Weave to their will. The process has its cost as it hurts the invoker so care must be taken when using Exploits.

Exploited spells channel raw Weave through the body of the caster to quicken spells.

The process consumes less Sorcery Points but hurt the invoker, causing [1] per Spell Level.

Arcane Empower increases the damage of spells with the Spellcasting Modifier of the invoker.

The effect lasts [1] turns and does [2] damage to the caster.
